Lanier Eason letter
Eason, Lanier
1978.075
0.08 Linear Feet in one folder
1976 A letter from Lanier Eason to Kitty and Hank Terjen discussing the author's memories of members of the Roebling family, dated 1976. The Roeblings designed and built the Brooklyn Bridge. Eason's mother (not named) appears from the letter to have known or married into the Roebling family. A0079
